name: Golem Garden
description:
Game made for a small game jam/school project with the themes 'plants' and 'rocks'.

In this peaceful rand relaxing game, embody a golem in a calm forest and discover rare flowers. Find them all to end the game!

Dowload and extract the zip file for a bettter experience.

Assets found for free on the Unity asset store.

Music owned by Nintendo, all rights reserved.
